oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Baker, James, 1863 March 09
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of James Baker, “of the 16th Civil District of Davidson County, State of Tennessee,” dated March 9th, 1863. Illustrates the first page of the document. Baker’s will was “Recorded in Book of Wills & Inventories No. 20, Page 440.” Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Baker family
